title: Tales of Love & Loss
description: These 20 short stories are fascinating companions to Hamsun€™s classic novels and contain echoes of the greater works he would later write and for which he was ultimately awarded the Nobel Prize. Alive with humor, melancholy, tenderness, and lawlessness, as well as sparkling with psychological insights, these stories have never been published in the United States until now.
author: Knut Hamsun
